#summary Alfresco Share extension for managing which person or group can start a specified workflow

= Introduction =

One of the lacks of Alfresco Workflows is that there's no possibility to allow workflow start and execution based on specified users or groups.
This simple extension allow this kind of control throw the global config file _share-config-custom.xml_
